value: Rehearsal went well. I think we’ll be able to pull off the performance without a problem.
joy
All we need to do next is replenish our energy and then we’ll be perfect! Let’s go for lunch together!
Ah､ I’ve got something to do､ so I’ll pass. You guys can eat ahead of me.
sad
(I hope that girl comes… Huh? It’s noisy around that bench area.)
You really were here in a place like this. You’re skipping yet again? I can’t believe you.
You’re doing this because I’m not at home because of work､ aren’t you…  We’re going home now. You have to study to make up for how late you are.
Let go of me! You keep going off on your own and deciding what I should do for you!
angry
(It’s that girl’s mother. Just like before､ it just seems the mother’s looking at her daughter without actually looking at her…)
normal
Excuse me. Could you please wait before you take her back home?
sad
I was the one who invited her here. I wanted her to come here and listen to our song.
angry
Even if it’s for one song only､ I want her to listen to our song. Please､ I’m begging you.
(Akuno-san’s even bowing his head…)
…Hey. Please､ just one song is fine､ right? When I’m done listening､ I’ll go right back home.
…There’s a crowd gathering up now because of you… Fine､ then. Just one song.
normal
(One song only… This must be the maximum compromise her mother can make.
It looks like I’ll have to put the message I want to say… all in one song､ then!)
